Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March contest (own choice) - 1st Lostwithiel 88, 2nd Gweek 86, 3rd Truro 84, 4th St Keverne 82. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 10, 2012, 9:27 p.m. July 23, 2015, 11:36 a.m.
